respectiv=
e descendants of Autobots and Decepticons!?! Look then.

He showed his shou=
lder. It was still muddy from the rainstorm he had
arrived in. He took a cl=
oth and started wiping the dirt off. Soon, he
revealed a bright red Autobot=
 insignia.

He smiled at the others.
